sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container fluid>
    <v-card v-for="serie in dItemsPopulares" :key="serie.id">
        <v-img height="250" :src="dUrlImage+serie.backdrop"></v-img>
    </v-card>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>

// SERVICES
import SrvSeries from '@/services/srv-series'

export default {
    name: "InitHome",
    data() {
        return {
            dItemsPopulares:[],
            dUrlImage: ''
        }
    },
    created(){
        this.fIniciarVariables()
    },
    methods:{
        fIniciarVariables(){
            this.dUrlImage = process.env.VUE_APP_URL_IMAGENES_API
            this.fGetPopulares()
        },
        fGetPopulares(){
            let payload = {
                params: {
                    api_key: process.env.VUE_APP_API_KEY_IMAGENES,
                    language: 'es-ES',
                    page: 1
                }
            }
            SrvSeries.getTvSeries(payload).then(respuesta => {
                this.dItemsPopulares = respuesta.data.results
            })
        }
    }
}
</script>

<style>

</style>
